params.markdown:
### Consumer

This dashboard provides visibility into the performance, health, and throughput of Kafka consumers.

- Tracks the maximum consumer lag to identify processing delays and potential bottlenecks.
- Monitors key consumption metrics, including the rate of bytes and records consumed per second.
- Provides insight into overall consumer throughput and workload traffic.

embeddableConfig.description: The total size of records memory consumed
embeddableConfig.title: Bytes consumed per second

embeddableConfig.description: The minimum rate at which the consumer sends requests to a broker
embeddableConfig.title: Fetch requests per second

embeddableConfig.description: The number of records consumed by a consumer
embeddableConfig.title: Records consumed

embeddableConfig.description: The volume of incoming data being processed by consumers
embeddableConfig.title: Incoming bytes per second
